kv1.4:1.3_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:1.4_0: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:1.5_1: ekadesaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:1.5_2: ekadesaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṁ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījī,
kv1.4:1.7_0: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:2.2_1: vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:3.2_0: Vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:4.3_1: ekadesaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:4.3_2: ekadesaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṁ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījī,
kv1.4:5.1_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:5.2_1: oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:5.3_1: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:6.2_1: oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:6.3_1: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:7.3_1: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:8.3_1: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:9.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:9.2_1: aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:9.3_1: ekadesaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:9.3_2: ekadesaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṁ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī,
kv1.4:10.2_1: aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:12.3_1: ekadesaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:12.3_2: ekadesaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṁ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī,
kv1.4:13.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:13.2_0: Rūparāgaṁ arūparāgaṁ mānaṁ uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:13.3_1: ekadesaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:13.3_3: ekadesaṁ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṁ tassa pariññātaṁ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṁ abhiññātaṁ, pariññeyyaṁ pariññātaṁ, pahātabbaṁ pahīnaṁ, bhāvetabbaṁ bhāvitaṁ, sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ,
kv1.4:13.3_4: (ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ) ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:14.2_1: mānaṁ uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:15.2_1: uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:16.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.
kv1.4:16.3_1: ekadesaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv1.4:16.3_3: ekadesaṁ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṁ tassa pariññātaṁ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṁ abhiññātaṁ, pariññeyyaṁ pariññātaṁ, pahātabbaṁ pahīnaṁ, bhāvetabbaṁ bhāvitaṁ, sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ,
kv1.4:23.4_1: samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
kv1.4:23.5_1: sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave,
